content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my daughters porch looking at this star blinking red an blue an green so i took a few pics so when i came in house i zoomed them up an i couldnt believe my eyes there was hundreds of ufos flying from the bright light there was red blue an white triangles some with two lights with six black spots around it an some with two white light. there were three lights in a row some red an white i would like to sell an for thirty grand ill show u where the lets say mother ships is so who ever can enjoy i also have a ufo i caught by accident when i was working on a squid boat in catalina it wasnt there when i took pic i just happen to catch it going by i was taking a pic of our skiff with sea gull on it with catalina in back ground and there it was my friend couldnt believe i got it  hes been on water working a light boat for twenty years he sees it all the time he calls it a beam ship he said it breaks up in five ships then sits in sky looking like stars  that one pic u can see the ufo perfect u can even see the antennas on it that pic was taken on june 26 2013 at 5:30 pm i know the gov. would love to get to know where the mother ship is it would show all non belivers there real  ufos iv been staring at that mother ship for two weeks now i dont know why it took so long to take a picture of it but tonight im gonna take more pics.   thanks for hearing me out gotta get busy to find a buyer of this awesome ship
content.summary: Red an blue an white an black triangles some with two white with black spots around it  some with three red in a row

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car in my driveway in northeast oakville, ontario around 10:50pm on march 19, 2015. i opened my door and the three objects were shining extremely brightly over the rooftops to my left. at first i thought they were fireworks, but they didn't fall or explode and kept becoming brighter. they moved in a triangular formation straight up at first, then across the sky toward me. they made no sound whatsoever and as i watched, the two lights furthest from me flashed and went out but i could still see the first light moving towards me. it was red-orange in colour and very bright. it looked like a ball of fire. as the first one went directly over top of me, i saw one of the two that had gone dark. it was a dull gray and i could barely see it, except that it blocked the stars and reflected the light from the streetlamps slightly. it passed directly over my head as well and it looked like the bottom of a plate from directly underneath it. it was hard to tell how big they really were because i couldn't tell how high they were when they were directly overhead. i did not see the third one pass over. they moved slowly and silently over top of me and then towards the end of my street and over the gorge. my first thought when i saw them was that i should hide, but then i just felt mesmerized and excited, then slightly afraid when they were gone. i lost sight of them when they passed below the tree line.
content.summary: Three red-orange orbs in a triangular formation, two went dark but still visible, flew silently over my head

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a foward battalion during desert storm. i was on guard duty at the time, sitting inside of a hemit truck. while playing my gameboy i noticed a light in the distance coming towards me. at first , i thought it was a humvee with one its headlights out. it was late in the evening so i was wondering if they might need some fuel. there was a large burm surrounding the camp. high enough to stop a tank from crossing, and the only opening was was where i was posting guard. the light as it got closer came over the top of the burm and thats when i turned on the high beams to idetify was was coming. thats when i noticed there was nothing on the side top or bottom of the lights. there was nothing there but a glowing light the color of highway lights, a dull orange.
 the light came closer towards me (about 20 feet away) hooverd off the ground about 3 feet in the air made a left turn ,  then just dissapperd. i am still in shock of what i saw the day. i will never forget, but i have no idea what it was or where it came from. but all i know is that its was not from this world. thank you for your time, i really needed to get this off my chest.
content.summary: All ball of light coming into are camp

content.detailedDescription:
Curtains were opened in lounge area , i saw big blackish thing sit there then take off. went out to see what it was then another one or same one was hovering south east about tree top level then took off real fast.
my mouth is still sore from last attack from them. now my mouth have not much control over it, i hear them laugh i hear them talk english . saying they want my power what power i dont know i guess woman hormones. 
im not letting them ave what they want i dont know what to do
i dont like them its ugly to me. that bug came back and when i looked in mirror looked like it was coming thru my mouth i dont know what they did to me or what there after ..They keep using my tv i catch them looking then it goes way . i have to turn my tv round so its not facing me just to feel better .
and they typed in my laptop when i was typing to mates on facebook 
they typed   "werehere"
and a whole album was bought from itunes not by me.
everyones internet went crazy then. and one song was installed on my itunes 
said in words when i listened to it
some body stepped inside ur soul somebody stepped inside ur soul little by little ur out that soul some one else is in controlll........
and with them attacks to mouth then mouth doesnt move properly 
i am thinking they want to possess to contact or talk thru possessing im thinking it im not sure 
and tried to move again from here and first time housing messed up with my bond second time cyclone marcia 
i am trying now for third time to get out of this place creepy place 
so many people have died here since them things showed up here
younger than me and older than me ...
more thn six so far in a year
i told govt something is wrong but nothing no one cares.
most people are sick here very sick 
and my hands still glow and sparkle and still hurts like hell.
content.summary: Just hurry up and do something

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog outside my house and was using a satellite app to find satellites while the dog plays and does his business.  after finding an watching three satellites and not finding the fourth i heard and saw one of our uh-60s flying past hershey park on their way back to ft. indiantown gap.  while watching the helicopter and noticing that several other airplanes and commuter jets were in the air on such a clear chilly night; i detected movement out of the corner of my eye.  i turned my head and there was a giant black v flying fat from the se to nw.  it had to my best recall, six red lights that i could see on the lower left wing, one under the nose and one i could make out under the right wing in the further most aft position.  i initially said 'holy ?@#$!'.  then i tried to commit as much detail to memory and take measurements.  with my arm fully extended and the right hand thumb and index finger fully extended than was the size from nose tip to trailing edge of a wing.  it was completely silent.  it travelled a heading of about 320-330 degrees.  it past over and just behind the blackhawk i was watching.  all other air traffic was unaffected.  i waited several minutes after trying to take a picture and no fighter jets were in trail or chasing it.  looking directly at it was harder than using off center viewing which is best for night time.  looking at it directly the red lights were very dim and the craft was shimmery almost like star trek cloaking.  with off center viewing you could see the red lights better and the outline of the craft.  it wasn't like it was flying.  it was like it was sliding on a solid surface.  it was so smooth, fast and silent.  whole exposure time was about 5 seconds.  to the average person that may not sound like much but to a aircrew member 5 seconds can be an eternity when the adrenaline and training kicks in.  i tried to get a picture with my cell phone but once you took your eyes off the craft it was hard to re-acquire the target.  then a tree was in the way and then i snapped a pic in the area it would of been in but it was inside the satellite app of my iphone.  doing my own research it mostly resembled the v from phoenix.  my educated guess on altitude and airspeed would be 5,000 feet  and 1000 mph. with zero sound.  heading 320-330 degrees and size estimate 300-350 feet long nose to tail/end of wing.  24 years military service; still active national guard.  enlisted for 15 years and now a warrant officer since 2006.  i spent my whole career in aviation and most of it flying and crewing ch-47 chinooks.  now a course writer and platform instructor.  i know aviation well and i am trained to react and work under pressure and unusual environments.  after the sighting i finished with the measurements.  looked up pa mufon and sent an email.  their report link is broke so i am submitting it here.
content.summary: Very large black v with red lights silently flew overhead through traffic from se to nw.

content.detailedDescription:
this happened in about 1965 or 1966.  i reported it also on the alex bennett talk radio show in about 1970.  i was ridiculed and asked by the host if i was on pot at the time.  that was the last time i told this event to a large group.
    i was about 15 or 16 years old at the time so my eyes were very good.I became a private pilot a few years later, so i have a scientific interest.  i was standing on the side of our public school waiting for my buddy to finish saying good night to his girlfriend. he was around the corner of the building a few feet away while i waited for him.
    while looking at the starlit sky, i noticed that one of the stars started to move, relative to a telephone pole across the street.  the star like object seemed like it was above the atmosphere.  it moved straight north about 1/2 the distance of the telephone pole and then stopped for a second.  then it moved again about a foot, based on a ruler held at arms length.  then it stopped again.  then it moved northeast about another foot, based on a ruler as a guide.  then it moved to the right about a foot at arms length,before stopping.  then it moved north again so that it was now about 60 degrees from the horizontal.  as it stopped, it began to get dimmer and dimmer.  i could see that this "star" was wavering or spinning a little before it finally diminished so that it could no longer be seen. it appeared to leave the area and the sun's reflection seemed to be the source of it's illumination.  i've never seen a satellite move in any direction other than in a straight line.  we didn't have sophisticated satellites back then, as far as i know, that would change direction and leave the earth's area.  i brought this to the attention of my buddy, who was too busy kissing his girlfriend goodnight, but he does recall seeing something like what i described.  to this day, i can not explain what i saw.  if there is a reasonable explanation for this, and you have similar reports, i'd like to know what i saw.  to this day, i'm still mystified.
content.summary: Starlike above atmosphere ascending, stopping, moving, changing direction, leaving

content.detailedDescription:
To:morgan beall,  state director mufon florida
i took rocco for a walk at a usual time during late sunset. as i explained earlier, carl paulson explained to me that after the sun sets the rays that are still shining light up into the sky, light up these crafts and they cannot hide from it.

so i intentionally walk every day at this time and look to the west to trap "ufo” potential activity.  3 years ago i caught a plasma powered cigar maneuvering right in front of me in the setting sun. 
i reported this to mufon and carl paulson explained its propulsion system and reason for its uncloaking.

fact: yesterday, march 19, 2015 @ sunset i am reporting two in echelon formation machines traveling from the nw sky toward the se at 20,000’  these “aircraft" were in routine echelon formation to each other. 
the one on the right was .25 miles forward and .25 miles to the right of the trailing wingman.

these machines were traveling at approx twice the normal airliner speed and making the very same small contrail signatures the plasma powered cigar i saw 3 years ago did.  they were clearly over the northern tip of sanibel island and coming over land toward me and in a se direction.

i immediately surmised they were experimental usaf pilots on a training mission going towards the upper keys. but their speed was incredibly fast for a landing approach.

however, usaf/usn planes do not leave contrails. usaf/usn planes are not allowed to break the sound barrier over land and they were way past that speed. in fact, i waited for the sonic boom after they would've
 past my position and heard nothing. 

they made my "strange list" and i stopped in my tracks and studied the sky waiting for them to pass my position.

fact: these machines did not exhibit any coloration like the orange/yellow plasma colors i have seen on 2 other occasions. the short contrails were white and did appear similar in size and diameter of what i witnessed before on the plasma powered et craft reported previously.

fact: under tight turns usaf will generate turbulent atmospheric conditions that will appear white.  however, these machines were moving in a straight line and much faster than mach1. 

fact: these machines were silent. however they were not past my position and the sound trails aircraft. so is this fact fuzzy? read on please. 

fact: here’s were it gets more strange, as they crossed over ground or as they approached a purplish/pink cloud they disappeared contrails and all.
i assumed the setting sun’s rays could no longer light them up and waited for them to come closer to me to get a visual. they were no longer visible at all.  wow.
they were gone. as if the were never there. missing from the sky, no contrails no sound, no physical objects on the trajectory they were traveling in…. nothing. gone

if: they made a turn at the speed they were traveling at the pilots would’ve died from extreme g forces. also, i would've had a better chance to see them with their wingtips up in the arc of the turn.  

conclusion: i still remain that these machines were usaf because of the common formation flying position. however, i have a nagging suspicion that 20% of 100% surety that they were extra terrestrial.
                    reason is because they are unknown and i have no data to determine origin one way or the other. i offer a 20% option to et is because of the overwhelming statistical data that does not allow common repeated et sightings. 
                    most sightings are misidentified aircraft, usaf/usn alien reproduction vehicles, atmospheric conditions etc leaving very little room for the 5% unknown potential et sightings.
                    question: does the military have sonic boom avoidance technology and cloaking capability for high speed aircraft?  answer: very likely military or black budget capability exists and american citizens are not in the "need to know" loop.

                    i am reluctant to keep reporting these sightings but the number of strange machines in the sky is increasing and undeniable.  i am a sober, military trained observer and do not seek any publicity or adulation for any reason whatsoever. 
                    in fact i consider this an intrusion in our airspace and wish i did not see these machines at all. these things are real and seem to operating routinely in our skies.
content.summary: Extremely fast aircraft with short contrails at 20,000 ft

content.detailedDescription: 3 buddies and ia paint and body shop all of a sudden jets flew over really low that was strange,i had to leave and see my wife at the hospital, about 1 mi away, on the way i noticed bright lights toward the hospital, i thought that was weird ,never noticed them before ,as i torned in to the parking lot i see these 6 bog lights over the trees by the river  ,that was strange because there is nothing there ,trees ,river,i parked soon as i got out my hair stood up and i was in shock to see what i saw,i knew something wasn't rite,the lights were blinking, not like a on / off switch ,but like a camera shutter open slow , and close slow,i see the grooves in the shutters i was so close, ran inside told the girl at the desk to come look, she ran inside i turn around at it  the shutters amazed me look to see the girl and it dissapeared, st johns county got called that night ,so the st johns co dispatch told me i never believed in things like that,in till u see what i saw,i go over that bridge and look at the sight  many i can explained it to my self by t there is nothing their,river and trees ,it has ben a while but i can see it as plain as day every time i cross that bridge, there's nothing there to hold lights up,the shutters were like nothing i'd ever seen, i been needing to tell someone about this for awhile, thank you for letting me share it with you'll thanks!!
content.summary: Black long, 250,300

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house watching tv at about 8:30 when my coon hound alerted me. so i walk outside and its calm and quiet. the wind wasn't blowing, crickets were sleeping, i mean erie kind of quite. so im looking around and don't see anything. that's when i noticed he was looking up at this huge object floating over the cattle field heading at a steady slow pace towards us, just a little to the south of where we were standing. all i could really see against the night sky was two lights that appeared to be attached to something huge. the space between the lights, was at least a football field apart. when it went by the house we never heard a thing and finally it disappeared behind the tree line out of my line of sight. i convinced my self that it was two helicopters flying at the same rate of speed, and the reason they were so quite was government technology and so and so forth. keep in mind i never told anybody about this. almost a year later i did some work on my neighbors car and she started telling me about 6 or maybe more lights she seen moving like they were connected, also quiet. about 5 years ago 2 miles down the road at thomas mill creek a friend of mine told me about a smaller object that hovered right above the water for a minute and left. i didn't think much about it until now.         there is a hydroelectric damn less than ten miles from hear at the end of lake eufaula. i have a hunch they may be charging up or something. i don't know what fuels the floating neighborhood. i do know golf carts are quiet though and they work off of electricity. the layout of the land, where i observed it barley above treetop level is shaped like a huge bowl or crater and was thinking it may have been avoiding radar. you can call me if you are interested. i have since been looking up stuff and have discovered your organization though all the stuff i have been watching.
content.summary: My dog alerted me approx. a year ago. we observed a huge floating object traveling in a straight line from w to e silent in no hurry.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were heading south to go to a store because we were going to his sister's house for a get together. he was driving, i was in the passenger's seat when my peripheral vision noticed a light & movement out the passenger window. i turned to look and saw an opague white glowing ball of light, about the size of a soft ball, right beside the window. it was staying at same speed as us, approx. 35 miles an hour. i looked at it then turned to my husband to say,"what is that?, and when i looked at my husband he was looking towards my way, and he said,"what the hell is that? i then looked back toward the window, and it had moved forward and was at my front corner of the windshield. it was like it had looked at me then moved forward to look at my husband. then it took off at the same height but very fast speed. we were in awe as we watched it vanish into thin air about a half mile ahead of us. we both felt like it had been looking at us to see who or what we are.We kept talking about it as we couldn't believe we had seen a ufo. we still talk about it and believe in ufo's.
content.summary: My husband and i in car, it came alongside passenger window and seemed to look at us then it left

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home, sitting out on my back deck which faces east. it was a very warm evening, somewhat hazy, partly cloudy. i'm looking towards the east, up in the sky, when this triangular craft abruptly appears out of nowhere, flying east, approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. it literally was not there one second and there the next. it continued flying east. i will be the first to admit that that is the direction of our main airport here. but the other strange thing that i want to convey is that the object...How shall i put this...Well, it didn't seem real. it shimmied in the sky...As though it was a projection. much like a projection on a screen would appear if someone nudged the projector. it honestly felt more like a projection to me rather than a real object. lending to that was the fact that, as i said, the object instantly appeared out of nowhere. it was triangular, almost boomerang shaped. eventually it went behind the trees toward the horizon and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Triangular craft with three bright white lights at front and tails. appeared out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: I was having coffee on my back patio like i do every morning before work at 5am looking at the sky, (orion happens to b in view) and saw 8 to 10 red orangish spheres in a triangle form not fixed on a craft but all moving independent from each other kind of wobbling. one of the spheres broke off from the rear of the triangle form and moved to the front like it was playing and the rest fell into form a triangle again. there was no sound!!! it was very surreal my friends think i am crazy but i know what i saw, and will continue to keep looking.It continued like on a flight pattern from east to north west , i watched until couldnt see anymore my eyes were sooo dry i didnt want to blink and miss anything!!!!!
content.summary: Amazing!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: On may 10th, 2014 my girlfriend, her daugter and i invited a few friends over for a bonfire. about 10:45 that night we all saw something pretty incredible. my girlfriends daughter noticed it first and got everyone's attention. my buddy and his girlfriend saw it next. when my girlfriend and i spotted it i started to record it on my iphone. we saw a craft with no clear edges or sides and it seemed to emanate ever changing light from its entirety thereby obscuring it's surface. it appeared to be 20-50 foot in length although its exact distance from me was not easy to judge so i couldn't say to any certainty its size or shape. it appeared to be in our neighborhood and hovering over the rooftops and a height of no more than a few hundred feet. i would say it was about 200-400 feet away from where we were all standing in our back yard. it would hover then move slowly then quickly, alternating between the three. when i say quickly i mean instantaneously. i would estimate that from the time we first saw it until it became stationary it traveled a couple thousand feet. this all took about 30 seconds. it then sat there for about 15 seconds at which point it started pulsing, let out a very soft but weird kind of electrical whine and then flew almost directly away from us towards the southern horizon at extremely high speed, then abruptly made an almost right angle turn to a course of almost straight up and at an unbelievably high rate of speed......All while staying directly in the center of our field of view. during this whole time the object didn't make a sound. not even the sound of air rushing over it as it whipped by us!!! it did let out a strange electrical noise, like it was charging up to take off and that's exactly what it did. 6 of us watched it and i have the whole thing on video. that's another oddity, what we saw with out eyes appeared maybe 30 foot across but it hardly showed up on the video, like it what cloaking itself or messing with the camera. i can't say what it is that i saw with any certainty but, i believe that it was not a plane, helicopter, rocket, jet, ballon, lantern or anything like weather phenomenon. it seemed to move intelligently and as weird as this sounds, it seemed biological in the nature of its movements and lighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 of us watched a silent large bright object hover over us 2mins the shot to space!

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were camping on the beach. at about 2 am, i left the tent to go to the toilet. as i walked out onto the beach i noticed a boat sized rectangular object (not curved like a boat, more like a rectangular block) hovering about 2 feet above the water. the water was rough that night but the object did not rock with the water and the water under it appeared to be completely still. the object had an appendage about 5 feet tall with a strong red light similar to a traffic light in size but brighter. as i spotted the object, the appendage immediately turned to my direction and the light focused on me. i felt very nervous as if it was watching me. it was definitely not a boat because i had lived in a coastal town for most life and this was not like any boat i had seen before as it hovered above the water, had an arm protruding from it and made no noise at all. at this time of night you usually will only see a fisherman every now and then. feeling scared, i went back into the tent, every time i checked it was still there for about 1 hour. i was awoken 2 or 3 hours later by 2 speed boats searching the area with torches. the object was very close to the shore, about 15 meters away.
content.summary: Observed a stationairy rectangular object hovering above the water. object had a vertical arm with a strong red light on the end. the arm moved and followed my movement. as i came into it's view, the arm turned and focused on me.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was closing the windows for the evening on sunday evening 3/15 and saw a strange set of red lights moving north to south at about 1200 feet. she called my attention to it and when i looked, the lights were now moving north. we studied the blinking lights as they moved together. they seemed to be larger than the marker lights on planes and helicopters that we normally see. i saw four red lights in a square pattern that blinked independently. my wife saw 2 red lights blinking seemingly randomly. we thought we could make out a dark mass attached to the lights that made us think it was a helicoptor from the local hospital. the night was quiet and we thought we could make out an engine sound but it was very faint and could have been from something else. we watched these lights move north then arc to the east and out of view.  as the object banked, we were then able to see a single steady green light on the craft. about five minutes later i saw the same craft follow the same northerly path. at the time i dismissed it as special lighting on the emergency hospital helicopters. then i read about other sightings that night. i am located near the kingshighway and arsenal intersection and would have been facing west.
content.summary: I saw four red lights in a square pattern blinking randomly.  they moved as one north at about 1200 feet.  as the lights turned east i saw a single green light blink along with the red ones.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving from guadalajara to chapala rounded curve to see very bright saturated color (bluish) green object seemed to be falling at nearly a 45 degree angle toward lake chapala and probably landed n lake. i was up on a hill and saw it fall to my level then lost sight in nearby trees. as i was on a hill driving downward i believe i actually saw it drop to below my level putting it very close to the level of the lake chapala.

if i were to guess this would seem to be a meteorite. i would thing the greren-blue coloring however would indicate excessive heat???

it seemed to emit an orangish halo.

time is approximate
content.summary: Driving from guadalajara to chapala rounded curve to see very bright saturated color (bluish) green object

content.detailedDescription: One after another moving ne and going upward from the back yard of our house. last year we saw the same but one less orb
content.summary: Spheres on fire

content.detailedDescription:
We were just entering the state mosque of doha, qatar to perform the maghrib(evening) prayer. as it is a beautiful mosque we were taking pics randomly just outside the mosque on its portico. when i saw the pics later at home the lights and formation caught my attention. totally unedited picture.  
please analyse the picture and let me know the facts. 
thanks.
content.summary: Accidentally caught on iphone 6-plus while taking pics just before evening prayer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was woke up this morning at 7am by banging thumping sounds i could feel in my chest. i swung the door open on the rv, and dismissed it thinking to myself, "are they really starting carpentry work at 7am"? began morning routine. there is no carpentry or construction work going on anywhere around here. at least not within several miles that i know of. so anyway the reason i reported this event as being so long is it is continuing actively right now as of 6pm still. about once every 40 minutes or so we get a explosive hit that "having been in the military, i know feels and sounds just like and artillery hit" sometimes it will be 3 to 5 of them in quick rapid progression, which ironically just occurred as i said that 3 of them at 6:03pm eastern time on the cell phone.... now about 8 more. (would be a very good time to look at sizemic activity. if you all have access.

also, i would be wonderful if you all at mufon could gear these reports a little more friendly towards those of us trying to report strange sounds. its sounded like a warzone off in the distance here all day, and nothing on the news or internet. i don't know where else to turn. mufan your welcome to contact me on phone or email

i looked on www.Somd.Com our local website for the area for anything about dynamiting and nothing.

6:09pm eastern...Big one just shook the whole rv... then 5 more in rapid suggsesion right afterwards.... ongoing
content.summary: The events i am trying to report here are artilery level explosions

content.detailedDescription: While i was looking out the window on the left side of my plane i observed a blimp like structure several miles away to the south. the object appear a few thousand feet higher than our plane was, which was 39,000 ft. it struck me as quite odd and out of place. within seconds it seemed like it just disintegrated and then disappear. i kept looking and looking for it to reappear, but it never did. at first it appeared white, but as it disintegrated i could see brown. i thought about asking the pilots if they had seen it as well as i was leaving the plane, but the opportunity did not present itself. i did not experience any unusual feeling. i had for quite a while been scouring the ocean below in hopes of spotting a ship. i observed 3 commercial jets flying the opposite direction several thousand feet below us during the course of my time looking for ships. there were clouds in the area, but the blimp object was way above any.
content.summary: Observed white blimp like structure above 40,000 ft while flying to hawaii

content.detailedDescription:
While visiting our daughter and son in law i snapped several photos with my smart phone of interesting places we saw that afternoon. i didn't see this artifact in the photo until i down loaded it on my home computer and enlarged the area in which this object shows up. i noticed a 'bright spot' on the photo. could be that it is so pixilated it is distorted. possibly aircraft but i see no wings or tail rudder on the object. i assume a expert in digital photography can tell us what it is. like i said, i never saw it when i took the shot.

camera: lg mod. vs985 4g
f-stop: f/2.4
exposure time: 1/487
iso speed: iso-50
focal length: 4mm
content.summary: Found artifact in photo when i got back to my daughter's home. didn't see it when i took pic

content.detailedDescription:
Le 15/03/2015 vers 3 heures du matin, je suis sorti sur mon toît terrasse de la résidence où je réside à monaco. après avoir allumé une cigarette, ayant du mal à dormir, il m'a été possible d'observer un évènement qui m'a choqué.

venant de la direction de l'aquarium ( musée océanographique ), un objet sombre s'est approché en volant lentement sans bruit , altitude basse mais plus haut que l'immeuble ou je vit au dernier étage. estimation: environ 120 metres.

l'objet a d'abord brievement stationné verticalement en l'air puis est lentement descendu pour atterir sur le toît terrasse de l'immeuble voisin , de hauteur similaire au mien.

une ouverture béante est apparue sur l'un des côté de cet objet oval sombre dont sont descendus deux êtres d'apparence humaine. porteurs de sortes de scaphandres de protection, rouges à petits pois roses, il m'a été possible de reconnaître ce qui semble être mon voisin.

m'ayant reperé, ils se sont précipités d'un bond dans l'engin qui s'est élevé lentement puis a disparu à grande vélocité vers l'horizon pour disparaître.

le second personnage ressemblait a sas le prince albert.
content.summary: Ovni atterrit sur immeuble cossu de monaco.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to bed around 10pm that night. i have many dreams every night, but on this night i could not remember one dream. i was awakened from sleeping as a blue/white sun like orb hovered through my closed bedroom window. during this time my eyes opened wide. i could not move, i could not speak. i was in sleep paralysis as all i could do was look at this brilliant blue/white sun like orb. it hovered in through my closed window from the west, stopped directly in front of my bed and only hovered about 4 feet off the ground. the color was amazing but i was in deep fear as i could not move or speak, only stare. it hovered for around 15 seconds until i finally awakened. upon waking, the orb was gone, without a trace of being there except within my own mind. since this experience, i've had roughly 15 earthquake & tsunami dreams within a 6 month span. i've never dreamed of these events ever before. i had only lived in long beach, washington for 2 months when this experience took place and in those 2 months, and before the experience, i found much information about the cascadia subduction zone that i previously did not know about. ufo's have been known to study earthquake prone areas before & after major events happen. they have been seen around chili subduction zone quakes & around the japan 2011 great quake. due to this experience of the orb, i am having a tendancy in believing the great cascadia quake is close to happening. people are ultimately unaware of this great quake in the pnw & maybe, just maybe because i knew about the information, & because i was new to the area, it, the orb, came to visit me. since the experience i have decided to move away from the quake & tsunami prone areas and continue to have these dreams. i have not seen the orb since moving away from the longest beach in the world.
content.summary: I was in sleep paralysis as it came hovered through my window

content.detailedDescription:
On friday the 13th i was returning  about 7:30 pm.  driving east on cape coral pkwy near 4 freedoms park.
six lanes of traffic quite busy i had to pay attention to driving.  i saw ahead to my left in the sky what i assumed was a  commercial plane flying toward the fort myers intnl airport.  but when i seemed to pass it, glancing , i noticed it had a line up of red, green and yellow lights along the full side.  it was not moving as i had to quickly glance back to see it.  when i was finally able to move to a side street, stopping and looking back , it had vanished.
it was  growing dark and the sky was partially cloudy, the vehicle being below the cloudline.  i heard no noise, and when thinking back realized it seemed small for a large jet to be that close.  i repeat, it did not move either as a jet would have been far forward of the traffic and i would not have had to look back to see it. i knew it must be a ufo by the colored lights that ran the full length.
am not good at describing distances and as i was driving did not think of it.
i am a mufon member and am trying to be more careful of such observations.
content.summary: Friday 13th 2015 sighting.  details follow.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my window and saw 8 to 10 ufos ...Im not saying  they were aliens but i do know it wasn't normal this is my 8 sighting i've recorded most of them.They always come to the same spot.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Abnormal!

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard. when i seen a black or appear out of nowhere hover for a few seconds then blank out of sight. i was able to take two pictures before it disappeared.
content.summary: Was a black orb that hovered for a second, and just blinked out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a large object with two bright white lights at each end, it moved slowly in one direction, then went up as it got close to my house, no noise . as large a my toyota. i noticed this morning that another light in house was out. this is number 3 so far this month.
content.summary: Saw a large white glowing object move  quietly. about 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home and traveling west on us highway 190 in my truck. as i was approaching nolanville hill to start my decent down the highway, i noticed a large, bright, orange, amber, red glowing light. it was shaped like an egg, with the small end at the top and seemed to be the size of a volkswagon beetle. it followed my truck across the top of the hill and dropped down to a lower level and continued to almost track my movement down the road. i continued to watch it closely and pulled to the side of the road shoulder, i had both windows open and i shut off my truck. there was no noise.. i then exited my truck to retrieve a pair of binoculars from my truck tool box. all the while the egg shaped craft was glowing and there was a solid outline of the egg, but the inside was like flowing lava, with a liquid fire like flame or pulsing boiling almost alive movement of what i call lava light. i found my binocs and put was raising to put them to my eyes... and that thing left out of there in a way that still sends chills up my spine... it was like warp speed x 10!! i traveled in a straight line trajectory to the nw. there is nothing on the face of this earth that can move like that! there is not a speed i can even equate to it. and it was intelligent and observing me. it did not want me getting a closer look. i marked the time and returned home and called the local skylark airport and ask if there had been any unusual activity reported at that time and they said no, and nothing on radar in that area. i will say that it has changed my life and my belief system forever.
content.summary: Was followed by a glowing egg shaped object or craft as i traveled down highway, i pulled over and observed and it left

content.detailedDescription:
We see it during our climbing tripo around el frey, in bariloche, argentina... it appear like a white ball move really slowly, the we get bored looking because move so slowly and for more than 20 minutes... the change the direction moving a little faster, and turn around itself and dissapear..

sorry for my english, i would like if you help me to identify what it was. and believe me please, before that event i did not belive in ufos or something like, but after that success i think there are other kind of lifes somewhere!

if you help me to make some other meaning, like about some thing our human sent to the sky i would be gratefull!

thanks!

pd. the picture is with an old camara, so sorry for the dusty lens any way we saw it ourself in the sky, after the success we realize that many people in the area could saw it too..
content.summary: A white ball moving slowly, then change direction turn in a circle and dissapear

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i observed saucer shaped pulsating objects in northern sky. difficult to determine size or distance. could have been very large which means they could have been near the east central minnesota/canadian border. they left at a remarkable speed. i had just become employed by city police department. felt duty bound to make report. initially contacted intl. airport msp. within minutes a ranking military officer from duluth base called. he asked questions and said they had not observed anything on radar. later i learned of several events on august 27, including salida colorado, bensalem pennsylvania, warren minnesota etc. i became astonished at the date/event ratio. i began to look into the subject, traveling to these areas, making contacts, where possible to ascertain facts. mr.Edwards from salida passed on, phil schneider is dead, al bielek died, so i called ken s. from mufon and began dialogue. intending to interview dan akroyd. there is more to my story, but i will end here. i was in the s tarchild program/project monarch. my father was a manchurian candidate in 1947. lots of cia and military ties. thankyou, tom
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Pulsating crafts 200 miles + in north sky viewed from minneapolis. crafts hovered moving occasionally then left at terrific speed. lights were defined pulsating consistent. called airport. recd return call from duluth military man who said no radar.
